meanings: boldness, nerve, audacity, (informal) guts, (formal) fortitude, (formal) temerity

vlive.korean: 지금? - 쟤는 근데 무슨 배짱으로 온 거? Right now? - What was he thinking to come out? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 바람피우고 잠수탄 전남친이 찾아왔다 [한입만] - EP.06

vlive.english: You want me to show my gut?

vlive.korean: 배짱을 보여줬죠. 눈을 보면 알 수 있었어요. You can see the nerves. You see it in the eyes. 듣기 View video WAV : [Versus]: Ep. 7.2 A Dedication
